extendedInfo.description: Flashify lets you share a url from a browser without Flash support to another browser that has Flash.This app does not include Flash, it just makes Flash easier to access after it's installed.I wrote it because I was annoyed that Chrome Beta doesn't support Flash and likely never will. This lets you easily switch to another browser that does support Flash without awkwardly copying and pasting the url.Flashify doesn't have to be used for Flash, it is useful for anyone that wants to switch browsers quickly on the same website.It has been tested with Chrome Beta, Browser (default), Dolphin HD, Firefox, Opera Mobile and should work in all browsers via the Share option. To use Flashify, open your favorite browser, press Menu->Share->Flashify.  Look at the screenshots to see how it works visually.THIS APP WON'T SHOW UP IN THE APP DRAW OR THE DESKTOP. It only adds an option to the SHARE MENU IN YOUR BROWSER.If you can't figure out how Flashify works, please email me and I will explain further. I can't respond to comments!Flashify is open sourced on GitHub: https://github.com/GodsMoon/FlashifySpecial thanks to Jose Cordoba for the new name and Rob Wilson for the video review and explanation.

reviews.title: Pretty freaking awesome
reviews.comment: This is such a simple idea. I like the original name \"Another Browser\" better, but I understand why the author changed it. I\'m not using it for Chrome/Flash issues, but I\'ve had plenty of cases where a page doesn\'t work correctly in the browser I\'m in and I want to open it in a different browser and this serves that purpose perfectly. Thanks for the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply awesome!!
reviews.comment: Thanks heaps for making this!   Saves me heaps of time and messing around. Any chance to add the ability to set a default \'share with\' browser in the future?   Regardless, this definitely gets a full 5 stars from me :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EVO / One X Problems solved!
reviews.comment: This fixes a major issue with the EVO 4g LTE and HTC One phones affected by the apple patent dispute.  This app allows you to open app links in the play store instead of the browser.  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it say ... WELL!
reviews.comment: It\'s perfect. Countless times I have had to copy and paste an url into another browser. This makes it quick and painless. Not only that but it doesn\'t open an app per se. It\'s a background operation as if Android included this feature within their OS. It\'s great. Must download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wish I heard of this sooner!
reviews.comment: I just upgraded to ICS 4.03 on my Toshiba Thrive tablet. Chrome was my default browser and I was about to switch to Firefox instead. Now I can still use Chrome and supplement it with Firefox when I hit a Flash page. The transition is seem less 2 clicks and presto. Saves me from having to take the time to move all my bookmarks. Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Have been using this for a long time. It has made it so easy to access all my browsers fast. Try it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Elegant solution
reviews.comment: Very simple app that means I can now set Chrome Beta as my default browser. Great job.  Extra points for no permissions needed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This is fantastic installed chrome cause its the quickest and best browser out there, thanks to you you have made chrome even better I can now play flash videos in a blink of an eye  all I can say is genius! Thanks so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very neat
reviews.comment: Does its job very well. A simple must-have for Chrome as a result of lack of native Flash support!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: What a simple intuitive idea! I didn\'t even know I needed this app until I read about it in the comments for Chrome. Now I don\'t know what I\'d do without it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant and simple
reviews.comment: Only thing I would like is the ability to set a default browser for it so it is one press rather than 2. Impossible to fault the app though - fantastic little addition
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Having trouble getting used to Firefox + time consuming to find all the equivalent add-ons I have in Dolphin. Will keep trying. Never had stability issue w/ Firefox, so don\'t accept that excuse from Dolphin for not allowing Flash. And Chrome--Google has to know how many people dumped Apple b/c they wanted full internet (and control of their device). Hope Adobe rolls over and dies :-) .
reviews.author: Allison Borovik

reviews.title: Just amazing!!
reviews.comment: Now I can use chrome and if there is flash I can go to opera to watch it!! Excellent!! Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Awesome
reviews.comment: Much needed. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Works as described. Simple and saves time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very good
reviews.comment: Work very well on nexus 7 I like using chrome but it don\'t have flash so this let me change to Firefox fast and easy keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Should be standard in the os! Brilliant, thanks.

reviews.title: Fricken Ace
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, can also let you quickly get to an app in the market app or play YouTube vids with the YouTube app.

reviews.title: Must have app.
reviews.comment: The ideal companion to the Chrome browser. Excellent.

reviews.title: Amazingly Helpful
